description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate-Coconut Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate-Coconut Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Grease and line a deep 20cm-round cake pan with baking paper. Melt chocolate, butter and 3/4 cup water in a medium saucepan over low heat, stirring until smooth. Remove from heat and stir in sugar. Cool for 10 minutes.

Stir in eggs and vanilla. Sift flours over mixture. Stir to combine. Stir in desiccated coconut. Spoon into pan, smooth top and tap on bench to remove bubbles. Bake for 1 hour 10 minutes or until cooked when tested. Stand for 15 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool on a wire rack. Chill for 4 hours.

To make the ganache, place chocolate in a bowl. Heat cream in a small pan over medium heat until it just comes to the boil. Pour over chocolate and stir until melted. Set aside, stirring occasionally, for about 30 minutes or until spreadable.
Cut cake in half. Place 1 layer on a plate. Spread with 1/3 cup of ganache. Repeat with second layer. Cover with remaining ganache. Sprinkle with shredded coconut.
